documents.document: @RPMain and you have a good day fella!
@RPMain I'm on my way home now thankfully. No need to apologise - I was in nightshift haze and wasn't expecting to see you.
@RPMain Morning fella! I thought that was you I passed at NBH this morning as a scuttled around ahead of doing the Shipping Forecast. 👋🏻
@danielcorbetttv except that they're all back-to-front down there 😉 Although easier to follow than the South American ones...
@JudithRalston @WindyWilson88 Now that's put a smile back on ma weary chops! 😁x
@MarkVogan huge congratulations to you all!
@danielcorbetttv ah he just got a bit of stage fright 😉 You're always welcome to come back to do a bit of editing if you like... 😅
Your quick look at Friday. Gales or severe gales in the English Channel later🌬️🌊 https://t.co/r7Y9ByXeEl
Stormy lows continue to have France as their main target over the next few days. https://t.co/QZeR1D3wUM
@WindyWilson88 @JudithRalston Sleep!?!? I wish! I've been up since 6am Wednesday. Who am I again.....
@stevend21607555 Nothing too extreme expected, but it'll be a windy evening with gusts around 50mph possible
Big waves have been battering the coasts of Portugal and NW Spain. More of that to come over the next few days! https://t.co/VTM3SrtF43
@chesterlampkin Not what I needed to see in the middle of a nightshift! 😫I remember that beach very well. Stunning!
@PurpleeileenE You should be ok MK way. Rain arrives there lunchtime/early afternoon
@stevend21607555 difficult to say yet Steve. Still only "yellow" warnings out from the Met Office so far

Hello early riser! Here's how Thursday shapes up.
You may need to grab a brolly...and hold onto it tightly 🌂🌬️ https://t.co/yvDHOT0268

@jules000111 aye...we're just on the edge of everything at the mo. Neither one way nor t'other. Though not had so many frost days in a while
@jules000111 think I'm back on World next Tuesday, then nights. Doing a lot of off air stuff at the mo

@markwrightuk88 you can get tornadoes any time, but the peak period isn't til later in the Spring. This is a tad unusual though

@markdennison tomorrow will be sunny and hot! #alternatefacts
@alexdeakin #backtoschool for both of us. Although I think I came out worse in this thread.

@chilternrailway Sorry to keep at you, but no seat again on the 08:52 today, and the service late again - driver couldn't explain why
@chilternrailway thank you. Appreciated
